import { useState } from 'react' import { Dialog } from '@headlessui/react' import { Bars3Icon, XMarkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import UserLocalStorage from '../Auth/userAuth'; import userAuth from "../Auth/userAuth"; import Input from "../components/input"; let navigation = [ { name: 'Domů', href: '/' }, { name: 'Recepty', href: '/recepty' }, { name: 'O nás', href: '/onas' }, ]; export default function Header() { const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false) if(userAuth.isAdmin()){ navigation = [ { name: 'Správa receptů', href: '/admin/recepty' }, { name: 'Správa uživatelů', href: '/admin/uzivatele' }, { name: 'Recepty', href: '/recepty' }, ] } return (
{UserLocalStorage.isUserLoggedIn() ? "Odhlásit se" : "Přihlásit"}
{navigation.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
{UserLocalStorage.isUserLoggedIn() ? "Odhlásit se" : "Přihlásit"} →
) } const iconStyle = { transform: "rotate(20deg)", fontSize: "2rem", color: "white" } const iconStyleAdmin = { transform: "rotate(20deg)", fontSize: "2rem", color: "black" } const headerStyle = { boxShadow: "0px 9px 24px -4px rgba(0,0,0,0.75)", }
